name: RWA News
description: Extraction config for RWA (Real World Assets) news from Telegram channels like RWAxyzNewswire

google_sheets.notes: Set spreadsheet_id to your Google Sheet ID. Share the sheet with the service account email.

notes: Designed for Telegram RSS feeds. Outputs hyperlinked headlines suitable for Google Docs. The output_format: hyperlink will format as [Title](URL) for easy copy-paste.
